mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER(u_id, u_password, u_name, u_gender, u_birth, u_job, u_degree, u_email, u_major, u_phone, u_career, u_provider, isManager, u_lastschool) values(#{u_id},#{u_password},#{u_name},#{u_gender},#{u_birth},#{u_job},#{u_degree},#{u_email},#{u_major},#{u_phone},#{u_career},#{u_provider},#{isManager},#{u_lastschool})
mapper.update: update MEMBER set u_birth=#{u_birth}, u_job=#{u_job}, u_degree=#{u_degree}, u_major=#{u_major}, u_career=#{u_career}, u_phone=#{u_phone}, isManager=#{isManager},u_lastschool=#{u_lastschool} where u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.select: select * from MEMBER where u_name=#{u_name} and u_email=#{u_email}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set u_password=#{u_password} where u_email=#{u_email}
